title: The Great Crusade and Horus Heresy
description: Covers the Emperor's reconquest of humanity, the betrayal of Horus, and the cataclysmic civil war that ends the dream of a unified Imperium.

title: Between Post-Heresy and Classic 40k
description: Spanning the long millennia between the Heresy and the modern era.

title: Classic 40k
description: The hallmark setting of Warhammer 40,000. Countless wars rage across a decaying galaxy ruled by a dying god.

title: Post Rift (Modern 40k)
description: After the formation of the Great Rift divides the galaxy in two, Roboute Guilliman launches the Indomitus Crusade to reclaim the Imperium.
